result.title: Invitation to Deadline24 Qualifying Round Replay Contest on Codechef
result.content:
Hello CodeForces Community!

The 2018 edition of the 24 hour programming marathon, Deadline24, is a unique contest featuring non-stop programming action and challenges. Now, you can step up your preparations for it by taking part in the replay contest of the 2017 Deadline24 Qualifying Round.

Here are the contest details:

Time: 9th February 2018 (2030 hrs) to 9th February 2018 (2330 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Contest link: https://www.codechef.com/DEAD2018

Registration: This is a team contest. Therefore, those interested must register here
(https://www.codechef.com/teams/register/DEAD2018) in a team and have a CodeChef handle to participate.

All those who do not have a CodeChef handle are requested to register in order to participate.

Happy Programming!!
Enjoy the round!!
